title: eth_syncing returns "false" when problem with peers
body:
**Description**
On our SyncTestnets action I've noticed that from time to time on sepolia `eth_syncing` checker step is moving further because it got `false` value. On logs I can notice


This endpoint should return false ONLY when node fully synced (no more Bodies/Receipts to be downloaded and state created)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Please provide the following information regarding your setup:
 - Operating System: Ubuntu
 - Version: 1.18.0
 - Installation Method: Sedge and GitHub Action agent
 - Consensus Client: Lighthouse
Before the end of "updating pivot" we didn't even start syncing, so `IsSyncing` = `false` is kind of logical ðŸ˜„ Worth to change `eth_syncing` to return `true` in pre-sync states
